Learn More Coming?

News

We are on our way to having the on-going financial support needed to open our doors thanks to those who have contributed thus far, but we're not there yet. With your help, it is our goal to have a physical location from which we may begin provding free and confidential services to women facing unplanned pregnancies by the end of 2016.

Late? Pregnant?

While the Southtowns Care Center has not yet opened to help meet local needs, the Northtown Pregnancy Center's compassionate support is just a phone call or short drive away.

Get Support

Will You Help?

The only way we can do this is with the spiritual, physical, and financial support of the community. Please consider joining us in serving the Southtowns of Buffalo.

Contact Information

Southtowns Care Center, Inc.
P.O. Box 892, Hamburg, NY 14075
(716) 508-0660
info@southcc.org
@southtownscc

Southtowns Care Center will provide free pregnancy verification and confirmation via a laboratory-quality urine test. We are not an abortion clinic and we do not refer for abortions.

We believe that everyone should have access to the services and information we provide. All of our services are free, confidential, and offered regardless of martial status, age, race, or religion. Some services are gender specific. The services provided by SCC are not substitutes for prenatal care or professional counseling.

© Southtowns Care Center, Inc. All rights reserved.
